summary: The test suite verifies the functionality of the Flux diffusion pipelines—including text-to-image, image-to-image, and inpainting—by running quick unit tests with lightweight mock components to check prompt handling, embedding creation, and QKV projection, as well as a slower full‑pipeline test on a GPU to confirm end‑to‑end inference correctness and model integration.
business_intent: Provide automated confidence that the Flux generation pipelines work correctly and deterministically, enabling fast continuous‑integration validation and comprehensive GPU‑based integration testing before deployment.
